mapper.insert: INSERT INTO category (category_type_id, icon, name, user_id) VALUES (#{categoryType.id}, #{icon}, #{name}, #{user.id})
mapper.select: SELECT c.id, c.name, c.icon, c.user_id, c.category_type_id, u.id, u.name AS user_name, u.email AS user_email, ct.id, ct.name AS category_type_name, ct.balance_type AS category_type_balance_type FROM category c LEFT JOIN user u ON c.user_id = u.id LEFT JOIN category_type ct ON c.category_type_id = ct.id WHERE c.id = #{id}
